info.name: Atom styled Stylus
info.description: This makes the Stylus editor look like the Atom Text Editor. NOTE: This ONLY works with the Stylus addon/extension.
info.additionalInfo: V1.2 (August 23rd, 2018): ► Fixes for new Stylus update. V1.2 (August 18th, 2018): ► Fixes to buttons and selectors. ► Remove 'Inconsolata' font and reset to default (Consolas). ► Fixes to plugin popup. ► Fixes for Chrome users. V1.1 (February 16th, 2018): ► Themed popout when pressed Stylus Button. ► Fixed areas of Editor. V1.0 (February 15th, 2018): ► First release - Some areas might not be themed. Please bear with me.
